engineering.title: Computer Engineering
engineering.p1: MsC alumnus from Instituto Superior Técnico (IST) of the University of Lisbon. Worked as a Teaching Assistant for Computer Architecture and Databases courses.
engineering.p2: Professional experience as System Administrator and App Developer at the Department of Computer Engineering (DEI) of IST, and as a Junior Researcher at INESC-ID, as part of the SARRROCA project.
engineering.p3: Worked for three years as a full-stack developer for CERN in Geneva, Switzerland, as part of the Indico project, an open-source web tool for organizing and archiving meetings, lectures and conferences. Coordinated the collaboration between Indico and JACoW, attending large conferences such as IPAC to perform user-tests in real-life scenarios and develop improvements to the tools together with its users.
engineering.p4: Currently working as an independent contractor developing web platforms focused on event management and organizing.
